contents:
Opinion
Pee Cubiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs. See Comerford Estate, 388 Pa. 278, 130 A.2d 458 (1957); Noonan Estate, 361 Pa. 26, 63 A.2d 80 (1949); Wentz’s Estate, 225 Pa. 566, 74 Atl. 424 (1909).
Mr. Chief Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
